Text.Language: Twbh m~P[oic e~h~r/i e~jwn: peniwt eyouab m~patriar,/c: Abba Kurilloc PimahCoou: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, our holy father the patriarch, Abba Kyrillos the Sixth, that He may forgive us our sins.
